mission.posting:
Hello everyone! Hope you're all having fun playing games this summer,
We are announcing here in this post that from now on we shall be using the new Surreal Engine 5 once Great Games release a stable build to us.
From now on, expect to see all of the new enhancements such as ray-tracing, better post-processing capabilities and other graphical/sound upgrades.
All of us at Unisoft look forward to bringing you the finest quality games in the video game industry!
Sarah Yang Unisoft CEO and Programmer

email.subject: Error
email.body: If you are seeing this then there has been an error in the Hacknet extension. Please contact Samaritan about this.
